about_the_game:
Do you really want to play a game with weird gnomes passing around a bomb panda as if it were the last Magic Full Art Collector Shiny Gold Art +++ card?
If your life and your friends' lives are so empty that this is all you have to do, welcome to this game (contender for the 2024 Game Of The Year) where the stupidest strategy is the key to success.



With frantic local multiplayer matches for up to 4 players, very poorly thought-out bonuses to unbalance the competition, and a soundtrack that will make you dance even while dodging explosions, get ready for hours of laughter and chaos! (non-binding offer, not subject to refund for this free game)



But the best part is, you don't have to be the best, you just have to not be the worst. And that, finally, is your chance to shine in society
